function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for digitalisation to compromise personal data privacy in water utilities","Impact":"Risk of privacy breaches and data exposure leading to legal and reputational damage","Mitigation":"Implement robust data protection measures and comply with privacy regulations, consider voluntary participation for data sharing","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage systems, anonymization techniques","People":"Citizens, companies, water utility customers","Owner":"Water utility companies, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Need to re-imagine water systems and infrastructure to address climate change and potential outbreaks","Impact":"Risk of inadequate infrastructure and systems to handle extreme weather events and new pandemics","Mitigation":"Upgrade water systems to accommodate climate change effects, integrate digital tools for better management, prioritize adaptive infrastructure design","Technologies":"Climate modeling software, digital monitoring and control systems, adaptive infrastructure technologies","People":"Communities, society at large","Owner":"Water utility companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Energy requirements and potential for counterbalancing savings in water systems digitalization","Impact":"Increased energy consumption leading to environmental and financial costs","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient digital solutions, use renewable energy sources for digital infrastructure, conduct lifecycle assessments for digitalization projects","Technologies":"Energy-efficient digital systems, renewable energy technologies, lifecycle assessment tools","People":"Environmental advocates, energy specialists, water utility companies","Owner":"Water utility companies, sustainability organizations"}]}
